name: Zenith 90 Stationary Flexion DistractionTable
descr:
90-Zenith Stationary Flexion Distraction

Standard Features:

5 Year Limited Parts Warranty
Fixed Cervical Headpiece
Face Paper Toweling and Dispenser 
Pivotal Thoracic Locks in any Position
Caudal Flexion/Distraction with Leaf Spring Design w/Tension Indicator
Manual Caudal Assist Handle
Lateral Flexion Locks in any Position
Axial Rotation Locks in any Position (not available w/drop option) 
Circumduction Combines Lateral and Vertical Flexion
Manual Plane Traction Adjusts Table Length
Adjustable Ankle Rest w/Ankle Cuffs
Lumbar Roll 
Sensation Upholstery 
Platinum Base Color

Table Specifications:
Length 79.5” to 89.5” 
Heights Available 20” to 32”(manual adjusts in 2” increments)
Width 21”
Cushion Width 21”
Weight 270 lbs.
